code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BotSpecs=_ref=>{let{bot,goBackToListView,addBotToArmy}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bot-specs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bot Specifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bot.avatar_url,alt:bot.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:bot.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Class: ",bot.bot_class]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Health: ",bot.health]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Damage: ",bot.damage]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Armor: ",bot.armor]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Catchphrase: ",bot.catchphrase]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Created at: ",bot.created_at]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Updated at:  ",bot.updated_at]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addBotToArmy(bot),children:"Enlist Bot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goBackToListView,children:"Go Back"})]})]});};export default BotSpecs;
